reviews.review: juegazo muy corto :c
k

Portal is perhaps one of the best games ever made. It is relatively short but that is what I love about it. On your first playthrough you might struggle on certain puzzles and feel like you are missing something. But, when you solve the puzzle you get such a feeling of relief! Oh...did I mention that in this game you get a portal gun? Yes! The main mechanic in this game is that you have a portal gun that can shoot two portals that connect. 

It starts simple, only using one portal manually until it ramps up every puzzle till you are launching yourself using gravity on your side. There is also an underlying story of mystery that I think everyone would enjoy. 

So, if you like puzzle games, science fiction, and Half-Life. ;) then you should play this. Not to mention it is usually on sale for low prices!

Personal Notes:I love the story and atmosphere of Portal, I love the build up to the ending and I really recommend buying but I found myself searching a playthrough some times but that might be because i have 5 brain cells. 10/10 would play again.
